modName: Mandu by Neo - UNPB BBP and TBBP
summary: BBP and TBBP support for the Mandu Armour by Neo. It requires Neo\'s Original mod.
descriptionHtml:
This adds BBP and TBBP support to the Mandu Armour by Neo. It requires Neo\'s Original mod. 

Required mods: 
- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/36431//?]Mandu by Neo[/url] 
- A body replacer with BBP or TBBP animations. Here you can find all the needed stuff: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/37900//?]UNPB REDUX PROJECT[/url] OR [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20227/?]Troublemakers Clothing[/url] 

Installation: 
I\'ve only included the cuirass meshes. Install the original mod, [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/36431//?]Mandu by Neo[/url], and then overwrite its contents with this archive.
You can use NMM (say no to update), or manually replace the files in the Data\\meshes\\NEO\\Mandu\\F folder.
Make sure you are using a BBP or TBBP package. Not doing so will cause your game CTD when equipping the cuirass piece. 

About the TBBP version: 
There are no butt weights, I had the \"crushed butt\" issue and removed those weights. It\'s my first time dealing with TBBP, I\'m not sure there won\'t be issues.

Credits and thanks: 
- Meister aka Neovinci for [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/36431//?]Mandu by Neo[/url] 
- xp32 for [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/37900//?]UNPB REDUX PROJECT[/url] 
- mrtroublemaker for [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20227/?]Troublemakers Clothing[/url] 
- xp32 and mrtroublemaker and someone else for the UNPB body
author: Meister aka Neovinci
